{3_PlayerName} receives a Unique Event for {1_CivShortDescription}.
{3_PlayerName} takes a luminary City State figure hostage!
{3_PlayerName} receives a Unique Event for {1_CivShortDescription}.
{3_PlayerName} organises the protection of Ivory, both in Siam and elsewhere.
{3_PlayerName} receives a Unique Event for {1_CivShortDescription}.
{3_PlayerName} forcibly monopolises the Porcelain market!
{3_PlayerName} receives a Unique Event for {1_CivShortDescription}.
{3_PlayerName} acquires blueprints for a new type of Stupa.
{3_PlayerName} receives a Unique Event for {1_CivShortDescription}.
{3_PlayerName} increases his control over merchants in Siam.
{3_PlayerName} receives a Unique Event for {1_CivShortDescription}.
{3_PlayerName} organises an alliance against Siam's enemies, dehumanising their opposition.
Gilding The Back Of The Buddha
My King, the envoys have arrived. I have them waiting in the gardens. Tell me, Your Grace, will you be requiring... assistance? Or will you be giving them a chance to be cooperative?
Receive a Great Person of your choice.
Bring about new cultural practices with {1_YieldCost}. An Emissary spawns in every City to spread the word. Gain a copy of [ICON_RES_IVORY] Ivory
Invest {1_YieldCost} into the Porcelain industry. Receive 3 copies of [ICON_RES_PORCELAIN] Porcelain, and all Workshops yield +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
For the cost of {1_YieldCost}, construct a Stupa in every City. Stupa gain +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
Incoming [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes generate +5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Cities generate +33% [ICON_GREAT_DIPLOMAT] Great Diplomat Points.
For the next {4_Turns}, your prisoners of war work your railways: Train Stations generate +5 [ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, [ICON_GOLD] Gold. The ensuing diplomatic crisis requires the recruitment of a Diplomat in every City.
Oh no, I do not anticipate any trouble. We are just asking for a hostage this time. Smooth things over.
*The elites of the various City States have developed a fascination with Ivory, driving elephants to local extinction*[NEWLINE]We are going to have a discussion about the importance of conservation of endangered species. Like elephants... and emissaries...
*Sangkalok pottery has become very popular in the courts of our neighbours*[NEWLINE]They are in fact here to buy our goods! Of their own accord this time!
*Local cultures have developed a unique Stupa, which has attracted the attention of our religious caste*[NEWLINE]Bring in the chests of gold. Now we will discuss the location of their Stupa schematics.
*It seems our traditional sources of income can no longer fulfil the requirements of a modern state*[NEWLINE]While it is true that we have had our differences in the past, it is time to discuss to put that behind us, and look forward to an ever-closer union.
We have, over the years, made it abundantly clear that we are not to be trifled with. Yet our enemies have revealed themselves nonetheless. With the aid of these fine gentlemen, we shall organise an alliance that will wipe them off the face of the Earth!
